name: Sofia
text: Cracked screen fixed in an hour. Amazing!

name: Marcus
text: Great prices on cases and chargers.

name: Dana
text: Super friendly staff and quick diagnostics.

name: Jamal
text: They revived my water-damaged phone like new.

name: Priya
text: Booked online, dropped in, and left with a working tablet.

name: Alex
text: The accessories wall is dangerous for my wallet.

name: Elena
text: Upfront pricing, no surprises. Highly recommend.

name: Noah
text: Student discount really helped. Fast turnaround too.
